modName: God of War - Blades of Chaos and Athena
summary: Are you worthy of wielding the Blades of the Gods?
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Mf9MY.png[/IMG][/center]


[center]This mod adds craftable [size=3][b][color=#f4a460]\'Blades of Chaos\'[/color][/b][/size] and the [size=3][b][color=#f4a460]\'Blades of Athena\'[/color][/b][/size] to the game of Skyrim
[size=1.5](Now in Sword and Dagger forms as of v1.5)[/size]



[size=4][b]- v1.2 -[/b][/size]
[youtube]G0ln8cvwTyw[/youtube][/center]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/Brwj4.png[/img]
You can craft the Blades using any Forge under the \'Daedric\' section.

To craft the [b]\'Blades of Chaos (2)\'[/b] or [b]\'Blades of Athena (2)\'[/b], you will need:
[list][*] 1 Daedra Heart
[*] 2 Fire Salts
[*] 1 Spell Tome: Fire Rune
[/list]

[center][url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/594991-blades-of-athena-dual-wield-weapon-mod-anyone][b]Pre-Release mod progress thread[/b][/url][/center]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/iZy5l.png[/img]
[list][*] Download with Nexus Mod Manager and make sure its checked under the Mods tab.
[*] Or download manualy and extract to your \\Data folder in your Skyrim directory. Then make sure the \'Blades_of_Chaos.esp\' file is active in the Data section of your SkyrimLauncher.exe.
[/list]



[img]http://i.imgur.com/JJ6mB.png[/img]
[u][b]v1.5[/b][/u]
- Made blades slightly smaller as felt they was TOO big after last update 
- Added \'Dagger\' versions of both blade versions 
- Added optional files to remove the scabbard from the player character

[u][b]v1.4[/b][/u]
- Made blades larger 
- Fixed clipping issues with the blood mesh

[u][b]v1.3.1[/b][/u]
- Made both blades compatible in one .esp 
- Can weild both blades simultaneously

[u][b]v1.3[/b][/u]
- Added \'Blades of Athena\' version (re-texture - check mod images) 
- Name in-game displays correctly if you have chosen the \'Blades of Athena\' version

[u][b]v1.2[/b][/u]
- Added fire particle effects to the blade 
- Blade now glows 
- Changed smithing recipe

[u][b]v1.1[/b][/u]
- Added On-hit Fire effects 
- Added glow map 
- Lightened blade colour 
- Added Critical Kill flame effect

[u][b]v1.0[/b][/u]
- Initial release 
- Adds craftable [b]\'Blades of Chaos\'[/b] to the game




[center]
[size=4][b]- If you like these, then you might like this -[/b][/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12720][img]http://i.imgur.com/NKkCm.png[/img][/url][/center]
